name: Chloroblast (Phibian)
description:
It’s time to face off with dastardly pests in CHLOROBLAST!

PvZ’s Zen Garden meets Bloons Tower Defense in this self-titled ‘Flower Defense’, where you cultivate plants to face off against unwanted bugs!

Plant seeds in your flower pots by dragging and dropping their respective cards, then spend the Pollen accumulated from pests to grow them into beautiful verdant warriors! 

You can then drag and drop them onto the field using LEFT CLICK, or alternatively, you can RIGHT CLICK to harvest your plants for gold! Gold can be used to permanently unlock new seed types and cultivate even more new plants!

Conquer the mighty boss pests and see how long you can hold out against the waves of enemies!

Made by Phibian and https://mooosey.itch.io/ for Ludum Dare 52 with theme "Harvest."

Featuring:

  • 7 different enemies
  • 5 unlockable plants
  • 2 unique mini bosses
  • 30 waves to clear
  • Complete original soundtrack
  • Stupid homemade sound effects
  • A hidden spider on a skateboard
